dct_title_s: A map of the sacred geography
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, territories of the tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Decorative title cartouche with illustrations of cherubs.
"Sold by John Senex at the Globe in Salisbury Court near Fleetstreet. And William Taylor at the Sip in Paternoster Row" -- title cartouche.
Inset map: The incampments of the Israelites in the desart.
